Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will hold the grid that the player will play the Battleship game on, it will also be Responsible for loading and saving the grid to a file. Compiled and run on Fedora Linux 26 Workstation edition
    Author:
    Daniel Kevin Blackley
